item.description:
Planning to take the red-dot path to Eliot Tower. Skyline path goes in circle from there. Furthest point will be the reservation headquater.  From map, it looks like 2.5 to 3 miles.  I think we can complete less than 2 hours. 

Please bring bottle of water. Layer clothes so that you can adjust as necessary.
item.how_to_find_us: Wearing SD Padres baseball cap. I am sure I am the only one with that...

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Hiking - Blue Hills on Sunday
